item.title: Automated Deployment of SpringBoot with Jenkins and Docker
item.description: Explore the power of Jenkins and Docker for automating the deployment of your SpringBoot projects. This blog post walks through integrating these tools to create a seamless CI/CD pipeline, enabling you to build, test, and deploy your applications as containerized services with ease, enhancing your DevOps skills.

item.title: Docker Overview for Getting Started
item.description: Docker takes containerization a step further by providing additional encapsulation for file systems, network interconnections, process isolation, and more. Greatly simplifies the creation and maintenance of containers, making Docker technology more lightweight and faster compared to virtual machine technology.

item.title: GDB debug guide
item.description: GDB is a powerful program debugging tool based on command line under UNIX/LINUX operating system released by GNU Source Organization. For a C/C ++ programmer working on Linux, GDB is an essential tool.

item.title: HugePages
item.description: Reduce page tables by increasing the size of operating system pages to avoid fast table misses. Large page memory optimizer is designed for malloc mechanism, which means allocating large pages to increase TLB hit ratio.
